content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":121471,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なに？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What?\""},{"lineNumber":121472,"originalJapaneseLine":"「素直になるのは駄目なの？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Is it bad to be honest?"},{"lineNumber":121473,"originalJapaneseLine":"　せっかく子供になったのにもったいない。","translatedEnglishLine":"It's such a waste since you’ve become a child after all."},{"lineNumber":121474,"originalJapaneseLine":"　甘え放題じゃん」","translatedEnglishLine":"You can be completely spoiled.\""},{"lineNumber":121475,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":121476,"originalJapaneseLine":"ばふっと志津香が布団から顔を出す。","translatedEnglishLine":"Shizuka suddenly popped her face out from under the futon."},{"lineNumber":121477,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、出て来た」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, she came out.\""},{"lineNumber":121478,"originalJapaneseLine":"「帰る……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I'm going home...\""},{"lineNumber":121479,"originalJapaneseLine":"「へ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh?\""},{"lineNumber":121480,"originalJapaneseLine":"もぞもぞ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Squirming."},{"lineNumber":121481,"originalJapaneseLine":"志津香は布団から這い出て、","translatedEnglishLine":"Shizuka crawled out from under the futon,"},{"lineNumber":121482,"originalJapaneseLine":"部屋からも出て行ってしまった。","translatedEnglishLine":"and then she left the room."},{"lineNumber":121483,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、やば、本気で怒らせたかも」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, oh no, I might have really made her angry.\""},{"lineNumber":121484,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ん、いや、照れてる？　どっちだ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm, no, is she embarrassed? Which is it?\""},{"lineNumber":121485,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あーん、とにかく待ってよ、お姉様ー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Aah, just wait, my lady—\""},{"lineNumber":121486,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":121487,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……なんなんだ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...What the heck?\""},{"lineNumber":121488,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はあ……なんでこんなことに……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Sigh... how did it come to this...?\""},{"lineNumber":121489,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あははははははは！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hahahahahahaha!"},{"lineNumber":121490,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ぼよーん、ぼよーん、ぼよーん！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Boing, boing, boing!\""},{"lineNumber":121491,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ナギ、ベッドの上で跳ねるのはやめなさい」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Nagi, stop bouncing on the bed.\""},{"lineNumber":121492,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はーい」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Okay!\""},{"lineNumber":121493,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まったく、騒がしいな……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Good grief, it's so noisy...\""},{"lineNumber":121494,"originalJapaneseLine":"「もう、なんでランスの部屋で寝ることに……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Geez, why did we end up sleeping in Rance's room...?\""},{"lineNumber":121495,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それはこっちの台詞だ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That's my line."},{"lineNumber":121496,"originalJapaneseLine":"　大きい時ならまだしも、","translatedEnglishLine":"Even if it were when they were bigger,"},{"lineNumber":121497,"originalJapaneseLine":"　こんなちみっこいの二人と寝てもな……」","translatedEnglishLine":"sleeping with two tiny little ones like these...\""},{"lineNumber":121498,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お前、ナギが言い出したからって","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You, just because Nagi suggested it,"},{"lineNumber":121499,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ちょいと甘いんじゃないか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"aren't you being a bit too soft?\""},{"lineNumber":121500,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ナギー、あんた歯は磨いたのー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Nagi, did you brush your teeth?\""},{"lineNumber":121501,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まだー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Not yet.\""},{"lineNumber":121502,"originalJapaneseLine":"「すぐやりなさい」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Do it right away.\""},{"lineNumber":121503,"originalJapaneseLine":"「今しようと思ってたのー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I was just about to do it.\""},{"lineNumber":121504,"originalJapaneseLine":"「人の話を聞けよ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Listen to what I'm saying...\""},{"lineNumber":121505,"originalJapaneseLine":"「さて……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Now then...\""},{"lineNumber":121506,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ちょっとあっちの部屋借りるわよ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I'm going to borrow that room over there for a bit."},{"lineNumber":121507,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ナギ、あんたも来なさい」","translatedEnglishLine":"Nagi, you come along too.\""},{"lineNumber":121508,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はーい」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Okay!\""},{"lineNumber":121509,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんだ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What is it?\""},{"lineNumber":121510,"originalJapaneseLine":"志津香とナギが連れ立って","translatedEnglishLine":"Shizuka and Nagi went together"},{"lineNumber":121511,"originalJapaneseLine":"洗面所の方へ行ってしまった。","translatedEnglishLine":"towards the washroom."},{"lineNumber":121512,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":121513,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ちょっと気になる。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I'm a bit curious."},{"lineNumber":121514,"originalJapaneseLine":"　見に行ってみよう」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'll go take a look.\""},{"lineNumber":121515,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おーい、何をしてるんだ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, what are you doing?\""},{"lineNumber":121516,"originalJapaneseLine":"「へ……？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh...?\""},{"lineNumber":121517,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、ランスだー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, it's Rance!\""},{"lineNumber":121518,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なにしてんだ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What are you doing?\""},{"lineNumber":121519,"originalJapaneseLine":"「パジャマに着替えちゅー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Changing into pajamas.\""},{"lineNumber":121520,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ、なるほど」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, I see.\""},{"lineNumber":121521,"originalJapaneseLine":"「へへー、私ねーもう一人でお着替えできるんだよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hehe, you know, I can already change clothes all by myself.\""},{"lineNumber":121522,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふーん、偉い偉い」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm, good, good.\""},{"lineNumber":121523,"originalJapaneseLine":"「でしょー♪」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Right? ♪\""},{"lineNumber":121524,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、あ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, ah...\""},{"lineNumber":121525,"originalJapaneseLine":"「しかし……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But...\""},{"lineNumber":121526,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ、本当にぺったんこ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, really flat..."},{"lineNumber":121527,"originalJapaneseLine":"　この世は無情だ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"This world is merciless...\""},{"lineNumber":121528,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いいから出て行きなさい！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Just get out of here already!"},{"lineNumber":121529,"originalJapaneseLine":"　炎の矢！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Flame Arrow!\""},{"lineNumber":121530,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あぢゃぢゃ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ouch, ouch!\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: せっかく子供になったのにもったいない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's such a waste since you’ve become a child after all.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ばふっと志津香が布団から顔を出す。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shizuka suddenly popped her face out from under the futon.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 志津香は布団から這い出て、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shizuka crawled out from under the futon,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 部屋からも出て行ってしまった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and then she left the room.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、やば、本気で怒らせたかも」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, oh no, I might have really made her angry."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ん、いや、照れてる？　どっちだ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm, no, is she embarrassed? Which is it?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あーん、とにかく待ってよ、お姉様ー」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Sigh... how did it come to this...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぼよーん、ぼよーん、ぼよーん！」
「ナギ、ベッドの上で跳ねるのはやめなさい」
「もう、なんでランスの部屋で寝ることに……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Geez, why did we end up sleeping in Rance's room...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大きい時ならまだしも、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even if it were when they were bigger,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こんなちみっこいの二人と寝てもな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: sleeping with two tiny little ones like these..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お前、ナギが言い出したからって
ちょいと甘いんじゃないか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: aren't you being a bit too soft?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ナギー、あんた歯は磨いたのー」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I was just about to do it."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちょっとあっちの部屋借りるわよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'm going to borrow that room over there for a bit.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ナギ、あんたも来なさい」
志津香とナギが連れ立って
洗面所の方へ行ってしまった。
「へへー、私ねーもう一人でお着替えできるんだよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hehe, you know, I can already change clothes all by myself."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: せっかく子供になったのにもったいない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's such a waste since you’ve become a child after all.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ばふっと志津香が布団から顔を出す。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shizuka suddenly popped her face out from under the futon.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 志津香は布団から這い出て、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shizuka crawled out from under the futon,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 部屋からも出て行ってしまった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and then she left the room.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、やば、本気で怒らせたかも」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, oh no, I might have really made her angry."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ん、いや、照れてる？　どっちだ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm, no, is she embarrassed? Which is it?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あーん、とにかく待ってよ、お姉様ー」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Sigh... how did it come to this...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぼよーん、ぼよーん、ぼよーん！」
「ナギ、ベッドの上で跳ねるのはやめなさい」
「もう、なんでランスの部屋で寝ることに……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Geez, why did we end up sleeping in Rance's room...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大きい時ならまだしも、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even if it were when they were bigger,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こんなちみっこいの二人と寝てもな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: sleeping with two tiny little ones like these..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お前、ナギが言い出したからって
ちょいと甘いんじゃないか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: aren't you being a bit too soft?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ナギー、あんた歯は磨いたのー」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I was just about to do it."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちょっとあっちの部屋借りるわよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'm going to borrow that room over there for a bit.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ナギ、あんたも来なさい」
志津香とナギが連れ立って
洗面所の方へ行ってしまった。
「へへー、私ねーもう一人でお着替えできるんだよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hehe, you know, I can already change clothes all by myself."
